article_title: Finding fixes to a broken mental health system
article_text:
Kokomo, IN (46901)

Today

Partly to mostly cloudy with a chance of thunderstorms. High 86F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 50%..

Tonight

Considerable cloudiness. A stray shower or thunderstorm is possible. Low 68F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph.

article_metadata.news_keywords: , psychiatry, mental health, mental illness, susan moody, jill dunn, bona vista, ken gardner, jeremy ashcraft, howard county jail, kokomo family psychiatric center, steve rogers, committee on mental health and wellness, kathy horton, post-traumatic stress disorder, mental health association of howard county, st. joseph hospital, howard county sheriff department
article_metadata.author: Carson Gerber Kokomo Tribune

og.description: Ask just about anyone who works with people suffering from a mental illness, and they’ll all tell you the same thing: Indiana’s mental-health system is in desperate need of repairs.
